snippet: A postmodern, eco-friendly mansion on nearly four waterfront acres in the affluent village of Sands Point, N.Y., is poised to enter the market at $38 million.
abstract: Multilevel post-modern mansion that has eco-friendly touches, such as geothermal heating and cooling, in Sands Point, NY, is poised to enter market at $38 million.
lead_paragraph: A postmodern, eco-friendly mansion on nearly four waterfront acres in the affluent village of Sands Point, N.Y., is poised to enter the market at $38 million.

headline.seo: Eco-Friendly Long Island Mansion for $38 Million
